PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-08302022-06-24,  ,  GAC,  ,  , 
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
SubjectEuropean Support Fund for the Co-production and Distribution of Creative Cinematographic and Audiovisual Works (“Eurimages”)
PrecisOrder authorizing the Minister of Foreign Affairs to take the actions necessary for Canada to accede as a full Member State to RESOLUTION (88) 15 SETTING UP A EUROPEAN SUPPORT FUND FOR THE CO PRODUCTION AND DISTRIBUTION OF CREATIVE CINEMATOGRAPHIC AND AUDIOVISUAL WORKS (“EURIMAGES”).
AttachmentsAttachment
